content: > **please note ** the graph for this pattern is free to view in its > entirety on my blog this ad-free > downloadable pdf enables me to be able > to bring you more free patterns in the > future go to the free graph here 2 **description ** show your support for art being still made by a human with this easy row by row single_crochet pattern this design can be made as just a square and incorporated into a larger design or you can make this wall hanging to display in all your arts markets this pdf includes both the graph and the written instructions the viewable pattern on divinedebris com only includes the graph 3 you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2025 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 https //www ravelry com/redeem/divine-debris code=antiaiwallhanging 2 https //divinedebris com/anti-ai-wall-hanging-free-crochet-pattern/ 3 https //divinedebris com/anti-ai-wall-hanging-free-crochet-pattern/
